project.name: Regis Claude Master

hero.headline: Research with Precision & Elegance

features.title: 6-Provider Fallback Chain
features.description: Anthropic → OpenAI → Google → Mistral → Groq → Ollama. Never lose a query.

features.title: AES-256-GCM Encryption

features.title: Web Grounding

features.title: Metrics Dashboard

features.title: Offline Support

features.title: Edge Functions
features.description: Vercel Edge deployment for global low-latency responses under 100ms.

v0Prompt: Create an elegant, sophisticated landing page for Regis Claude Master - a multi-provider AI research assistant. Use a refined dark purple theme (#0f0f23, #1a1a3e) with gold/amber accents (#d4a574). Include: 1) Hero section with headline 'Research with Precision & Elegance' and subtle animated gradient. 2) Provider chain visualization showing 6 AI providers in a flowchart (Anthropic > OpenAI > Google > Mistral > Groq > Ollama). 3) Features grid with 6 cards using lucide icons. 4) Security section highlighting AES-256 encryption with a lock animation. 5) Metrics dashboard preview showing latency charts. 6) Footer with Witcher-inspired quote from Regis. Use elegant typography, subtle animations, glassmorphism cards. Font: Crimson Text for headings, Inter for body.
